abstract: Third Point said on Thursday that Yahoo had quietly set the record date of its meeting for May 17, giving investors until Monday to buy shares and settle their ownership records. A company spokeswoman confirmed the date and said that Yahoo was not trying to hide it.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Loeb Says Yahoo Quietly Set Record Date for Annual Meeting
